history.proof: intros Phi H1 x. split. - intros H2. apply (derivable_assum Phi x). apply H2. - intros H3. sfirstorder depth: 3use: deduction_subst.

exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma Phi : context H1 : derivable_closed Phi x : expr H3 : Phi |-- x Unable to unify "(let (derivable) := ?Gamma in derivable) Phi x" with "Phi x".

original: intros Phi H1 x. split. - intros H2. apply (derivable_assum Phi x). apply H2. - intros H3. apply (deduction_subst Phi Phi x). intros y Hy. apply Hy. apply H3.
